website_summaries.verdict: A kneeling pad that is on the softer side for those who want more cushion. This well-made option has softness, though it's lacking in support and density.
pros: Water resistant and easy to wipe clean
cons: Less support than comparable kneeling pads

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Any Kneeling Chore
customer_reviews.text: My achy knees sure do appreciate this pad. I just couldn’t find anything comparable locally and wasn’t impressed with the low rated reviews for strap-on knee pads. This one is longer than most (about 20”) and thick (about 2”). It is impossible to take the cover off (spot clean only) but feels like there are two pieces of memory foam surrounding a stiffer pad in the middle. Stitching on both side seams and handle is very good. I’ve just started having problems with my knees, but this pad is helping me ease into the transition of living with osteoarthritis. It’s handy for any household chore that requires kneeling and a real godsend when used outdoors on rougher garden terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyfingers

customer_reviews.title: I like this knee pad
customer_reviews.text: I like this knee pad. I am a long distance bicycle rider. At least I used to be. My knee cap cartilage is almost gone. I spend more time these days in my yard and in the prayer garden I maintain at church. This pad helps me a lot when I have to get down on the ground to plant or dig up something. The cushioning is really good on my bad knees. If it would help me get back up, now that would be great!! just kidding. good product..
customer_reviews.author: B. cabaniss

customer_reviews.title: Order this if you do a lot gardening!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of work outside in my garden. This product is great. It really does provide cushion for your knees. It is pretty thick...I would've liked it just a little bit thicker so I'm giving it 4 stars, but it seriously works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult for me to sit on my knees. So I was really hoping that this would be a great help to me whenever I need to kneel. It is okay. But my knees are still sensitive. This would probably work well for others.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good for Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this outdoors. I have been too busy using it for indoor activities. When I have to kneel or sit on the floor to do a craft, it saves my poor old bones. Even use it on my footrest because it is so comfortable. Also use it to sit on wooden benches that ordinarily I would be in pain from in a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good for multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Kneeling can be painful for me so I tried this pad to see if it helped, and it helped a lot! I use it in the garden - it's quite comfortable. We also took it with us to use as a seat to make the wooden bleachers for tolerable for a graduation - it worked great for that too! The pad cleans up quickly and dries fast. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both have difficulty in working on our knees in our gardens. These cushions are soft and supportive and help a great deal. They are high quality and reasonably priced and are a perfect thickness and size. We had purchased another product initially but we returned them because they were way too hard to be of any help. Thank goodness we found this product.
customer_reviews.author: A movie fan, WA USA

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Garden
customer_reviews.text: Great product for weeding or other yard work to reduce stress and pain on the knees. The foam is thick and comfortable and the surface wipes clean pretty easily. Only downside is that it's not machine washable. I did anyway...since it got very muddy, but it absorbed a lot of water and took forever to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely one of the best products I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best products I have ever bought! It is very comfortable and has memory foam. I use it for sitting when grooming dogs and kneeling when cleaning or gardening.,
customer_reviews.author: lauren carey

customer_reviews.title: The best pad that I have ever had and I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: The best pad that I have ever had and I've had several. Recently used it in the bathroom when I was re-grouting some ceramic tile and for the first time I had no trouble with my knees. Works well outside in the garden too. Plan on buying another for a gift. Don't waste your money on any other knee pad cause this one is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any gardener
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I got it as a gift for my mother-in-law who is a huge gardener. I felt it for myself to see if it was good quality and it was very comfortable! I almost wanted to keep it as a seat cushion. Not sure on durability but definitely soft and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Easy On The knees
customer_reviews.text: Only used it briefly, but it was very easy on my knees and yet sturdy. I placed it on a scrap piece of cardboard so as not to stain the cover on the wet grass. Don't know if the outer cover is water and/or stain proof.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey D

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, goody value
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and gave one to a gardening friend. I use mine as a kneeler pad and a sitting pad for our cape cod comfies. I bought them for $9.75 each and locally could not find one less than $25. I was limited to blue but that's ok, they are a good size, very cushioning and keep me from leaning over which strains my back.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This kneeling mat was hard on my knees. I was expecting it to be squishy and reform its shape when done using, but when you are done kneeling the shape stays stuck with divets. It felt like there was a piece of thick cardboard in the middle. I returned this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some other pads were also good but very stiff
customer_reviews.text: This is my preferred pad - soft but substantial. Some other pads were also good but very stiff. This one is perfect! Glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: music teacher

customer_reviews.title: Poor value
customer_reviews.text: It is small--perhaps my fault for not realizing it, but nevertheless be aware of its small size. To me, it is way overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: bigboppar

customer_reviews.title: Great kneepad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knee pad. Has memory foam in it to make it extra comfortable. I've tried others, but this one rocks my knees and I have no problem getting up and down. Our knees get more sensitive as we age, so this is a great product to help that process.
customer_reviews.author: Treker

customer_reviews.title: Thank you from my knees.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best knee cushion I have ever had! I also gave one to my local repairman to ease the pain when he is down on the hard ground or gravel hooking up equipment for towing. He thinks It's great too.
customer_reviews.author: GranMary

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, But not what I expected. Could be alot thicker. I have used the foam pads that I purchase at local stores and I would say it is only slightly better. Not worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Pony Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have bad knees and this cushion allows me to kneel when I am pulling weeds or scrubbing woodwork.
customer_reviews.author: ultra-ralphus

customer_reviews.title: Knee Saver
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of gardening, especially pulling weeds on my knees, and this has been a life (or should I say "knee") saver. It is very comfortable and light weight. It is just right for my outdoor projects.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!! My old kneeling pad lasted a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful!! My old kneeling pad lasted a good 25 years but alas, it was duct taped to death. This pad is delightfully thick, wide and extremely comfortable! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzo

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to be able to say my prayers while kneeling
customer_reviews.text: Recovering from knee replacement surgery. I am happy to be able to say my prayers while kneeling.
customer_reviews.author: KAROLE

customer_reviews.title: They are nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. The old knees still hurt, could be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Durable - Gardeners Delight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who loves to garden but is older and needs some support under her. She loves this - said it’s the best kneeler she’s had.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my work face painting children. I sat on it on top of a tool box. Very soft and comfortable. Easy on the knees as well. 3 hours of work and not problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jabroni

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pad
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery! Great product, so handy and easy to move around with you to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second one. One for yard work and one for floor scrubbing and other floor related in-house cleaning. Very comfortable and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Tivoli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Padding!
customer_reviews.text: This cushion lived up to our expectations! Much more padding than others we have tried. Also a nice size~wide enough to protect knees of all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I still have my old foam knelling pad, and this one is so much better. The cushion is much softer and more padded. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: but this pad is amazing. So much easier on my knees
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pad for kneeling in the garden. I really didn't want to pay $20+, but this pad is amazing. So much easier on my knees, and is so comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived about 15 minutes before I pulled out of the driveway to go camping (shipped quickly). It really saved the day when rolling off my air mattress onto the ground in the tent (left it in the plastic bag so its still like new). I'm using with a kneeler to soften that up for low chores. Could be a bit thicker but it is nice and soft on the knees and it does provide decent cushioning. Lightweight. By far the best price I came across as well and well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Pat M.

customer_reviews.title: My Massage Therapist likes it.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my Massage Therapist since she does certain massage moves kneeling. She said it felt good and liked that it had a handle.
customer_reviews.author: iztima

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort for kneeling jobs.  Lightweight and easily portable.
customer_reviews.text: lightweight but comfortable and easily portable. I bought 2 for friends who are painters.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M. Thie

customer_reviews.title: Save your knees
customer_reviews.text: A gardening must for all. save your knees and work longer

customer_reviews.title: Cushions Well
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable on my old knees! Nice thick pad that is easy to take with you to the garden.

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT ANOTHER!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for garden kneeling, but it was so nicely made, and made such a nice seating cushion that we bought another (in a different color) so we could EACH have one for travel and sports!

customer_reviews.title: Love! The product is very comfortable whether kneeling or ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! The product is very comfortable whether kneeling or sitting while I work in my garden. Lightweight to carry & has a chain attached allowing it to be hung up.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best and most comfortable knee pad to do gardening and washing floors!!

customer_reviews.title: And she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an avid gardener. And she loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time for Fathers Day. Husband love it. Nicely made, very cushioned

customer_reviews.title: soft kneeling pad you will love
customer_reviews.text: I love this kneeling pad - feels like a soft gel pad - very easy on the kneel

customer_reviews.title: Great for yard work
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft yet durable. And it's large enough that I can either sit or kneel on it.

customer_reviews.title: Cushion for Kneeling
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my kitchen on my tile floors

customer_reviews.title: I love the shape that gives you more knee room as ...
customer_reviews.text: So much comfort! I love the shape that gives you more knee room as you move around and reach.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanneinks

customer_reviews.title: Its an OK cushion
customer_reviews.text: It’s an OK gardening cushion, i feel it’s a little thin and maybe a little too small. They could have added just a little more padding to cushion bad knees. Its also a bit on the pricey side, i would have expected this to come in around $12-15.
customer_reviews.author: Ian MazurskyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a kneeling pad that is comfy! So many are stiff. This one is cushiony.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable. Little pricey but knees like it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one to replace an older cushion. Very soft and comfortable. Little pricey but knees like it!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This knee pad is super soft and well worth buying. So glad I did!

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT. IT'S A BLESSING
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT . IT'S A BLESSING. I HAVE A BAD KNEE. SO IT CERTAINLY HELPS. THANK YOU D CIMINI

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful and I no longer experience a lot of pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this for yoga now as extra cushion in places that I don't have much from surgeries. It is wonderful and I no longer experience a lot of pain from certain poses! The carrying handle makes it easy to grab for class.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the color ~ great save for my knees when cleaning the kitchen floor.

customer_reviews.text: will find out in the spring how it works but came as expected and looks well made

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. nice and comfy on my knees. good cushion.

customer_reviews.title: with bad knees even comfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought for present for wife for gardening, with bad knees even comfortable for me.

customer_reviews.title: and can comfortably do my gardening

customer_reviews.title: Kneeling pad
customer_reviews.text: Used by bathtub to kneel and wash hair. Great comfort on old knees.

customer_reviews.title: Offers a little protection, but not much
customer_reviews.text: After getting it and seeing how small it is and how inexpensive it must be to make, I can't believe I spent as much as I did on it (twenty five). It definitely could use more cushion, but it's better than having my knees on the ground and it does provide a little cushion for them. Spot clean only, made in China.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cushion for my knees I've ever used I Highly Recommend It

product_meta.title: IdeaWorks - Comfort Kneeling Pad - Two Layer Memory Foam - Lighweight - Built-in Carrying Handle (Green)
feature_bullets: Memory foam sitting or kneeling pad reduces pain and discomfort
Absorbs shock, adds a cushion whether sitting or kneeling great for statium seating or gardening
Features a lightweight design and convenient carrying handle for people on the go
Nylon/neoprene/ foam, easy wipe clean, 20"L x 11.75"W x 1.75"H
